e24b54962437789e3178758e06c90df5c2f6bbc1.commitMessage:
Indentation:
One more bug fix to make.
Now IndentationCheck accepts
new int[] {1, 2,
           3};

but rejects
new int[] { 1,
    2, 3};

It's temporary fix to make Checkstyle's sources clear
from Indentation check posint of view.
